topic: Managing large scale Gen AI Project
question_text: You're tasked with deploying a large-scale Generative AI application for a Fortune 500 company, integrating it with diverse proprietary data sources and ensuring high performance, cost-efficiency, and ethical compliance. How would you architect and manage this project from concept to production?
hook_text: Architecting large-scale Gen AI applications requires bleeding-edge MLOps and infrastructure. Hereâ€™s how to do it right.
cta_text: Master these concepts for your next AI role! Follow for daily Cloud Architect tips.

answer_sections.title: Scalable RAG Architecture
answer_sections.text:
Implement RAG workflow.
Vector DB retrieval.
Optimize inference performance.
Scale grounded AI responses.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Leverage RAG architecture with robust data ingestion, vector database, and high-throughput inference endpoints for scalable Gen AI.

answer_sections.title: LLM MLOps & Observability
answer_sections.text:
Setup LLM MLOps lifecycle.
Automate CI/CD deployments.
Monitor GenAI performance metrics.
Alert on model hallucinations.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Implement MLOps for LLM versioning, automated deployment, and continuous monitoring of Gen AI specific metrics like hallucination.

answer_sections.title: Governance, Cost, & Ethics
answer_sections.text:
Enforce strict data governance.
Optimize cost via model selection.
Deploy bias detection filters.
Mitigate ethical AI risks.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Address data governance, optimize costs via model selection, and enforce ethical AI guidelines with continuous bias detection.
